mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERTB( MID, MPASSWORD, MPHONE, MNAME, MPHONE, MADDRESS, MPOINT, MEMAIL) VALUES( {#mid}, {#mpassword}, {#mphone}, {#maddress}, 0, {#memail})
mapper.select: SELECT MID FROM MEMBERTB WHERE MID=#{mid} AND MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}
SELECT*FROM MEMBERTB ORDER BY MID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMERTB SET MPASSWORD=#{mpassword}, MPHONE=#{mphone} WHERE MID=#{mid}
